verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against <WH413> Gog, <WH1463> the land <WH776> of Magog, <WH4031> the chief <WH7218> prince <WH5387> of Meshech <WH4902> and Tubal, <WH8422> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> him,

And say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2005> I am against <WH413> you, O Gog, <WH1463> the chief <WH7218> prince <WH5387> of Meshech <WH4902> and Tubal: <WH8422>

And I will turn <WH7725> you back, <WH7725> and put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> into your jaws, <WH3895> and I will bring <WH3318> you forth, <WH3318> and all <WH3605> your army, <WH2428> horses <WH5483> and horsemen, <WH6571> all <WH3605> of them clothed <WH3847> with all <WH3605> sorts <WH4358> of armor, even a great <WH7227> company <WH6951> with bucklers <WH6793> and shields, <WH4043> all <WH3605> of them handling <WH8610> swords: <WH2719>
Persia, <WH6539> Ethiopia, <WH3568> and Libya <WH6316> with them; all <WH3605> of them with shield <WH4043> and helmet: <WH3553>

Gomer, <WH1586> and all <WH3605> his bands; <WH102> the house <WH1004> of Togarmah <WH8425> of the north <WH6828> quarters, <WH3411> and all <WH3605> his bands: <WH102> and many <WH7227> people <WH5971> with you.
Be you prepared, <WH3559> and prepare <WH3559> for yourself, you, and all <WH3605> your company <WH6951> that are assembled <WH6950> to you, and be you a guard <WH4929> to them.

After many <WH7227> days <WH3117> you shall be visited: <WH6485> in the latter <WH319> years <WH8141> you shall come <WH935> into <WH413> the land <WH776> that is brought <WH7725> back <WH7725> from the sword, <WH2719> and is gathered <WH6908> out of many <WH7227> people, <WH5971> against <WH5921> the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> have been <WH1961> always <WH8548> waste: <WH2723> but it is brought <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of the nations, <WH1471> and they shall dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983> all <WH3605> of them.

You shall ascend <WH5927> and come <WH935> like a storm, <WH7722> you shall be like a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land, <WH776> you, and all <WH3605> your bands, <WH102> and many <WH7227> people <WH5971> with you.

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> It shall also come <WH1961> to pass, that at the same <WH1931> time <WH3117> shall things <WH1697> come <WH5927> into <WH5921> your mind, <WH3824> and you shall think <WH2803> an evil <WH7451> thought: <WH4284>

And you shall say, <WH559> I will go <WH5927> up to the land <WH776> of unwalled villages; <WH6519> I will go <WH935> to them that are at rest, <WH8252> that dwell <WH3427> safely, <WH983> all <WH3605> of them dwelling <WH3427> without <WH369> walls, <WH2346> and having neither <WH369> bars <WH1280> nor gates, <WH1817>

To take <WH962> a spoil, <WH7998> and to take <WH962> a prey; <WH957> to turn <WH7725> your hand <WH3027> on the desolate <WH2723> places that are now inhabited, <WH3427> and on the people <WH5971> that are gathered <WH622> out of the nations, <WH1471> which have gotten <WH6213> cattle <WH4735> and goods, <WH7075> that dwell <WH3427> in the middle <WH2872> of the land. <WH776>

Sheba, <WH7614> and Dedan, <WH1719> and the merchants <WH5503> of Tarshish, <WH8659> with all <WH3605> the young <WH3715> lions <WH3715> thereof, shall say <WH559> to you, Are you come <WH935> to take <WH7997> a spoil? <WH7998> have you gathered <WH6950> your company <WH6951> to take <WH962> a prey? <WH957> to carry <WH5375> away silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> to take <WH3947> away cattle <WH4735> and goods, <WH7075> to take <WH3947> a great <WH1419> spoil? <WH7998>

Therefore, <WH3651> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559> to Gog, <WH1463> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> In that day <WH3117> when my people <WH5971> of Israel <WH3478> dwells <WH3427> safely, <WH983> shall you not know <WH3045> it?

And you shall come <WH935> from your place <WH4725> out of the north <WH6828> parts, <WH3411> you, and many <WH7227> people <WH5971> with you, all <WH3605> of them riding <WH7392> on horses, <WH5483> a great <WH1419> company, <WH6951> and a mighty <WH7227> army: <WH2428>

And you shall come <WH5927> up against <WH5921> my people <WH5971> of Israel, <WH3478> as a cloud <WH6051> to cover <WH3680> the land; <WH776> it shall be in the latter <WH319> days, <WH3117> and I will bring <WH935> you against <WH5921> my land, <WH776> that the heathen <WH1471> may know <WH3045> me, when I shall be sanctified <WH6942> in you, O Gog, <WH1463> before their eyes. <WH5869>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Are you he of whom <WH834> I have spoken <WH1696> in old <WH6931> time <WH3117> by my servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030> of Israel, <WH3478> which prophesied <WH5012> in those <WH1992> days <WH3117> many years <WH8141> that I would bring <WH935> you against <WH5921> them?

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass at the same <WH1931> time <WH3117> when <WH3117> Gog <WH1463> shall come <WH935> against <WH5921> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> that my fury <WH2534> shall come <WH5927> up in my face. <WH639>

For in my jealousy <WH7068> and in the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678> have I spoken, <WH1696> Surely <WH518> <WH3808> in that day <WH3117> there shall be a great <WH1419> shaking <WH7494> in the land <WH127> of Israel; <WH3478>

So that the fishes <WH1709> of the sea, <WH3220> and the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven, <WH8064> and the beasts <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> and all <WH3605> creeping <WH7431> things that creep <WH7430> on the earth, <WH127> and all <WH3605> the men <WH120> that are on the face <WH6440> of the earth, <WH127> shall shake <WH7493> at my presence, <WH6440> and the mountains <WH2022> shall be thrown <WH2040> down, <WH2040> and the steep <WH4095> places shall fall, <WH5307> and every <WH3605> wall <WH2346> shall fall <WH5307> to the ground. <WH776>

And I will call <WH7121> for a sword <WH2719> against <WH5921> him throughout all <WH3605> my mountains, <WH2022> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD: <WH3069> every man's <WH376> sword <WH2719> shall be against his brother. <WH251>

And I will plead <WH8199> against him with pestilence <WH1698> and with blood; <WH1818> and I will rain <WH4305> on him, and on his bands, <WH102> and on the many <WH7227> people <WH5971> that are with him, an overflowing <WH7857> rain, <WH1653> and great <WH417> hailstones, <WH68> <WH417> fire, <WH784> and brimstone. <WH1614>

Thus will I magnify <WH1431> myself, and sanctify <WH6942> myself; and I will be known <WH3045> in the eyes <WH5869> of many <WH7227> nations, <WH1471> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>
